com.nokia.midp.examples.m3g.maze3d
Class MazeCanvas

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
          javax.microedition.lcdui.game.GameCanvas
              com.nokia.midp.examples.m3g.maze3d.MazeCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class MazeCanvas
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.game.GameCanvas
implements java.lang.Runnable

The main class used by the 3d maze midlet. It setups the 3D scene and does the movements and rendering

canMove

private boolean canMove(float stepx,
                        float stepz,
                        boolean forward)
decides whether it is allowed to move to a given place otherwise it is possible to cross walls and go outside the maze

Parameters:
stepx - the attempted x step
stepz - the attempted z step
forward - true if direction is forward
Returns:
true if allowed to move to a given place

sizeChanged

protected void sizeChanged(int w,
                           int h)
It is possible that the canvas size may change and the application must be prepared to resize itself accordingly. This routine just calls application methods stop, init to handle this change in conditions.

Parameters:
w - width
h - height
